0.text: G'day viewers, my name's Graeme Stevenson and I'd like

4.text: invite you to come on a journey of creativity and learning and adventure through the series

8.text: Colour In Your Life. There's and artist in every family throughout the world.

12.text: Lots of times there's an artist deep down inside all of us as well.

16.text: So grab your kids, your brothers, your sisters, your aunties,

20.text: uncles, and mums and dads, and come and see how some of the best artists

89.text: you always had a great love of art, even as a child. [Doreen] Oh yeah, I loved painting.

93.text: [Graeme] Yeah. [Doreen] Painting and drawing and color. [Graeme] And the thing was in England

97.text: in those days, obviously after the war, there really wasn't many places you could go

101.text: to where you could learn art. [Doreen] No, nowhere at all that I could find.

105.text: All I found was someone teaching me to draw from little

109.text: paster casts [Graeme] Yeah. [Doreen] in pencil, on small pieces of paper.

117.text: color in my life. [Graeme] Yeah, funnily enough. But you went on

125.text: for aircraft. [Doreen] Yeah, it was closest I could get to anything
